name: Snail With a Slime As a Shell
name_original: Snail With a Slime As a Shell
description:
A short top down game . In this game you are a snail with a slime with a shell.  You have to fight other snails with slime shells. They will get harder as you progress. Made with Unity.

Controls:

WASD  - Movement

LEFT CLICK- Shoot

Genre:

Action Adventure
